description: This file defines a custom exception class 'NotYourTurnException' that extends RuntimeException, used to indicate an attempt to move out of turn in a chess game backend.

classes.name: NotYourTurnException
classes.description: A custom RuntimeException thrown when a player attempts to move out of turn.

methods.name: NotYourTurnException
methods.description: Constructor that creates a new instance of NotYourTurnException with a specified message.
